channel.title: Hi, I'm Aaron Francis from getmantis.com
channel.description:
Hey there.
My name is Aaron Francis and I'm building my first product at [getmantis.com][1], while my brother is focused on selling it. We've recently launched and have a few beta customers in there using it on a full time basis. I've been building it for ~8 months.
I went to my first conference this year (MicroConf) and quickly followed that up with BaconBizConf because MicroConf was so valuable. I can't wait to meet some more bootstrappers and learn from yall!
Other places to find me: aaronfrancis.com twitter.com/aarondfrancis [supplied.io][2] a little side project in my mantis downtime :wink:
[1]: http://www.getmantis.com [2]: http://supplied.io

item.title: Hi, I'm Aaron Francis from getmantis.com
item.dc:creator: rtablada
item.description:
Seems like a really cool product.

As a dev battling also jumping into sales, I can really value the fact that you have someone out there selling for you.

Read full topic
item.source: Hi, I'm Aaron Francis from getmantis.com

item.title: Hi, I'm Aaron Francis from getmantis.com
item.dc:creator: ian
item.description:
I was at BaconBiz, sorry I missed you. Thanks for sharing. Like the niche concept!

Read full topic

item.title: Hi, I'm Aaron Francis from getmantis.com

item.description:
Yeah… that’s a whole series of posts.

We’re getting there though.

item.source: Hi, I'm Aaron Francis from getmantis.com

item.title: Hi, I'm Aaron Francis from getmantis.com
item.dc:creator: andrey
item.description:
Hi Aaron. Welcome!

I regret missing MicroConf this year, and now I’m starting to regret missing BaconBiz; people are saying it was fun.

Good luck with your product. It would be awesome if you post, at some point, how the whole “you make it, your brother sells it” team up is working out.

Read full topic
